Html:
Hi all,

Currently I have an excel file with 20 sheets.

This file can be downloaded, but instead of the user having to download all 20 sheets, I'd like to have filters which determine which sheets are downloaded.

i.e. If I choose sheets 10-15 in an html form and hit download, an excel file is downloaded containing only sheets 10-15.

Can this be done with PHPExcel? Any direction would be great.

Thanks,

James
